summary: A hideout, fit for a thief, an assassin or a rogue mage, located in the canal of Riften.
descriptionHtml:
Hey, this my first mod-release on the Nexus. I messed around with the Creationkit before, but this is the first content that is worth releasing.

I was inspiried by BerryPunny and his Simple Riften Canal Home mod, because his didn't match my expectations.

What I wanted was a hideout that looks like its actually located in a canal, but still feels like home. The hideout contains some valuables, a lockpicking skill book, one steel dagger, one hunting bow, an alchemy workshop, a cooking station, a bed and alot of containers. It is very basic and I'd never add something like weapon displays or mannequins. I use it in my thieves guild & dark brotherhood playthroughs. There is no quest or key, its yours right away.

Enjoy.





Known issues:

- I can't figure out why, but followers won't enter the god damn place, even though I finalized both the interior and the exterior navmeshes.
- The exterior entrance is ugly a f. If anyone thinks he can improve it, feel free to do so. I would include an improved version in an update.
author: A-Bomb
